messages.subject: FW: [UnschoolingDiscussion] New Group
messages.msgSnippet: http://groups.yahoo.com/group/Learninginfreedomeveryday  I am sorry about all these emails…Please
messages.messageBody:
http://groups.yahoo.com/group/Learninginfreedomeveryday
<http://groups.yahoo.com/group/Learninginfreedomeveryday>

I am sorry about all these emailsPlease check this group out to see if its
for youthen you can join if you would like.

Thanks again,

Heidi




There is a new Relaxed- Home-Unschooling Group.
If you know of anyone that may be interested in this group please pass this
email on to them.

Thanks,

Smile and have a Great Day!!

Heidi
